heading: Is long-term unemployment an issue in the EU27?
subheading: In 2023 on average 2.1% of the labour force in the EU27 were unemployed for 12 months or more. This marks a 32% decline compared to the level from 2018 (3.1%).
textNote: The long-term unemployment rate represents the percentage of people unemployed for 12 months or more within the labour force. The age group in focus is 15-74 years old.
